segments.text: Mr . Bryant ? Hi , I'm Mike from Florence Incorporated . I'll glad you made it okay . How was your flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was pretty bumpy , also a bit long , all together about 5 hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is a long flight . You had a layover too , is that right ? You must be tired .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually I feel quite rested . I was able to sleep on the plane .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good ! Here , let me help you with your bag . Is it your first time to Seattle ? I'd be happy to take you around this city and show you the sights tonight if you're up to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be very nice . You're too kind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've already made a hotel reservation for you , let's go to the hotel first and drop off your things . Then , I'd like to have a drink so that we can get better acquainted . I've booked a table at an exclusive restaurant downtown . Afterwards , I've made arrangements to take you to see the city lights . Seattle â€™ s nightlife can be really quite exciting . How does that schedule sound to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds great . Thank you for your hospitality .
segments.speaker: S2
